message:
2018-12-29

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/12/02/cnn10/ten-content-mon/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1812/03/sn.01.html

오늘은 미국에서 정치 가문으로 유명한 부시 가문에서 고 아빠 부시의 업적과 생애에 관한 이야기를 다룹니다.

Today's story is about the late father Bush's in the Bush family, which is famous for its political family in the United States, achievements and life.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 07:40
An in-depth look at the life and legacy of former U.S. President George H.W. Bush, who passed away on Friday at age 94.

07:40 - 09:05
Major earthquake that shook the state of Alaska last week.

09:05 - 10:00
Basketball teams that visit Texas' Splendora High School could think they're seeing double.
